Hello. I'm Lei(Rayne) Zhang.

I am a senior student in the School of Software at Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I am a research member at the Digital ART Lab of Shanghai Jiao Tong University, supervised by Xubo Yang and Shuangjiu Xiao. I have also conducted research at Cascade Lab in University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign, supervised by Wai-Tat Fu.
My research interests lie primarily in the fields of Human Computer Interaction, Mixed Reality and Game Design. I combine my love of computer science, music and art to create novel interactive technologies. I hope to work on combining mixed reality and game design with qualitative and quantitative research methods to help people gain better experiences and strengthen their abilities. You can check out some of my projects/portfolio here.

Feel free to contact me via Email, Github, and Facebook.

Research

Assembly Assitance in Augmented Reality (On-going)

Cubicle: An Adaptive Educational Gaming Platform for Training Spatial Visualization Skills (IUI'2018)

Sketching Interface for Spatial Training Platform

Augmented Reality TV System Based on Multimodal Mixed Interactive Editing (ChinaVR'2017)

Projects

Music Shooter: A Musical Shooting Game in VR

VR Maze: A VR Gaming Platform for Training Navigation Abilities

Automatic Water Level Detection System

Family: An Android App for the interactions in family

Link Game: A Simple Game Developed using FLTK
